  <p id="round_name_field"><%= f.text_field :name, value: "Round" %></p>


        <span>
          <% if f.object.ended %>
            <%= f.number_field :score_home, :readonly => true %> 
          <% else %>
            <%= f.number_field :score_home, min: 0  %>    
          <% end %>            
        </span>
